  • Method Details

    • getDriver

      public static org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver getDriver()

      Returns:
      Current instance of the WebDriver

    • initDriver

      public static void initDriver(String browserName, String version)
      Method to initialize driver using WebDriverManager using parameters - browserName & version by invoking Driver Factory.

      Once initialized, the driver instance is passed onto DriverManager class which is used for Thread management of Driver instances.

      Using driver from DriverManager, browser is opened with url configured in Config.properties file

      In case of any exceptions occurring with Driver initialization, custom exception of @link BrowserInvocationFailureException is thrown at runtime

      Parameters:
      browserName - Parameter to decide which browser needs to be set for the driver.
      version - Parameter to decide which version needs to be set for the browser in the driver
      Throws:
      BrowserInvocationFailureException

    • quitDriver

      public static void quitDriver()
      Method to quit the driver and remove Driver instance from DriverManager
